headline: Vulcan Materials Company (VMC): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Vulcan Materials Company (VMC) on Substack by LongTermValue Research. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on VMC. Vulcan Materials Company (VMC)’s share was trading at $240.10 as of April 2nd. VMC’s trailing and forward P/E were 34.75 and 28.74 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Vulcan Materials (VMC) […]
